FilterItemPortable.Name: Contas a pagar
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="DOCUMENTODIGITADO"> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">((A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'E' OR A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'I') AND (A.TIPODEMOVIMENTO IN (1,2)) OR ((A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'S' OR A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'O') AND (A.TIPODEMOVIMENTO = 3))) AND (A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'R' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'F' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'A' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'B' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'D' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'G' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'H') AND ((A.EFETUANDOINTEGRACAO <> 'S') OR (A.EFETUANDOINTEGRACAO IS NULL))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>1=1 AND ((A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'E' OR A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'I') AND (A.TIPODEMOVIMENTO IN (1,2)) OR ((A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'S' OR A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'O') AND (A.TIPODEMOVIMENTO = 3))) AND (A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'R' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'F' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'A' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'B' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'D' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'G' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'H') AND ((A.EFETUANDOINTEGRACAO <> 'S') OR (A.EFETUANDOINTEGRACAO IS NULL))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Contas a receber
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="DOCUMENTODIGITADO"> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">(((A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'S' OR A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'O') AND (A.TIPODEMOVIMENTO IN (1,2))) OR ((A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'E' OR A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'I') AND (A.TIPODEMOVIMENTO = 3))) AND (A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'R' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'F' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'A' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'B' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'D' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'G' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'H') AND ((A.EFETUANDOINTEGRACAO <> 'S') OR (A.EFETUANDOINTEGRACAO IS NULL))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>1=1 AND (((A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'S' OR A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'O') AND (A.TIPODEMOVIMENTO IN (1,2))) OR ((A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'E' OR A.ENTRADASAIDA = 'I') AND (A.TIPODEMOVIMENTO = 3))) AND (A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'R' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'F' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'A' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'B' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'D' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'G' AND A.ABRANGENCIA <> 'H') AND ((A.EFETUANDOINTEGRACAO <> 'S') OR (A.EFETUANDOINTEGRACAO IS NULL))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
